overview: Sweetheart proudly presents the latest volume in the popular star showcase series Loves Girls. Shyla Jennings, the two-time AVN girl/girl performer of the year positively shines in four, explosive lesbian scenes. In the tradition of the heavily lauded series, Shyla has handpicked her co-stars, and the resulting scenes are smoldering, passionate and awe-inspiring. Interwoven with candid interviews, The movie truly illustrates Shylas love of women. Also starring Sara Luvv, Scarlet Red, Charlotte Stokely and Anikka Albrite.
title: Shyla Jennings Loves Girls
